name: Hardstyle
description: Hard, four-on-the-floor kick drums, fast tempo around 150 BPM, reverse bass and harsh, distorted synths.

children.name: Dubstyle
children.description: Characterized by the incorporation of the half-time rhythms and wobbly basslines of Dubstep.

children.name: Dubstyle
children.description: Characterized by the incorporation of the half-time rhythms and wobbly basslines of Dubstep.

children.name: Early Hardstyle
children.description: Forerunner subgenre that emerged around the turn of the 2000s from Hard Trance and Gabber, distinguished by the signature reverse bass groove, slower tempo around 140 BPM and straightforward, repetitive sound.

children.name: Early Hardstyle
children.description: Forerunner subgenre that emerged around the turn of the 2000s from Hard Trance and Gabber, distinguished by the signature reverse bass groove, slower tempo around 140 BPM and straightforward, repetitive sound.

children.name: Euphoric Hardstyle
children.description: Melodic, more lighthearted, and accessible Hardstyle.

children.name: Euphoric Hardstyle
children.description: Melodic, more lighthearted, and accessible Hardstyle.

children.name: Nustyle
children.description: Developed out of Early Hardstyle from the mid-to-late 2000s, by incorporating distorted, crunchy, pitched kicks, faster tempo around 150 BPM, and detuned supersaw/square synth leads playing stompy, dramatic melodies.

children.name: Nustyle
children.description: Developed out of Early Hardstyle from the mid-to-late 2000s, by incorporating distorted, crunchy, pitched kicks, faster tempo around 150 BPM, and detuned supersaw/square synth leads playing stompy, dramatic melodies.

children.name: Psystyle
children.description: Prominent Psytrance influences, especially the basslines and energy of mainstream psytrance.

children.name: Psystyle
children.description: Prominent Psytrance influences, especially the basslines and energy of mainstream psytrance.

children.name: Rawstyle
children.description: Incorporates earlier Hardstyle and Hardcore [EDM] influences into the sound of 2010s hardstyle, creating a distinctly harsh, simplistic, raw, and dark sound, with fast BPM.

children.name: Rawstyle
children.description: Incorporates earlier Hardstyle and Hardcore [EDM] influences into the sound of 2010s hardstyle, creating a distinctly harsh, simplistic, raw, and dark sound, with fast BPM.
